name: 10 Line Cargo Collect
description:
A game created as response  Jonas Tyrollers 10 lines of code challenge.
!Because of this restriction the game is extremely poorly optimized!

Challenge Rules:
- using statements don't count
- a ; ends a line

Collect your lost cargo crates and optimize your route to beat your record time.

Controls:
WASD - Turn Spaceship
Space - Accelerate

Attribution:
- "cargo spaceship" (https://skfb.ly/6sRST) by FDU_oficial
- "Asteroids Pack (metallic version)" (https://skfb.ly/o6LtG) by SebastianSosnowski
- "Scifi Cargo" (https://skfb.ly/otuGU) by Yic73499
- Music: New York 1988 by Mountain State
